component.text: Inter-area route summarization is configured on Area Border Routers (ABRs) and applies to routes from within the AS. In order to take advantage of summarization, network numbers in areas should be assigned in a contiguous way to be able to combine these addresses into one range. Summary routes between autonomous systems are configured on the Autonomous System Border Router (ASBR).
